title: Новые русские сенсации
overview: Each issue is primarily a loud exclusive, an information bomb or a poignant, touching monohistory of a celebrity whose name is known throughout the country, and whose life is full of dramatic events. A candid interview in the genre of a television confession, meetings with loved ones with whom they shared years, distances and past resentments. Unknown facts and twists of fate of a famous person, family secrets and skeletons in the closet, presented to the attention of viewers for the first time.
